storyInfo: The audience has scattered in every direction, and the battle between assassins has shifted elsewhere. Everyone reminisces about the past.

attributes.content: Sora, are you alright?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yes, I'm fine.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Are you going after Texas?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: When I saw her a minute ago, she told me to wait for her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Let's hunker down until this mess blows over. It's total mayhem out there.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: If you don't want to lose her, you're gonna wanna go after her.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I feel like it's the same with Lappland.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: For people like her, there's no point trying to guess at what they're thinking. It's better to just accept what they say at face value.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Only if every word they say is true can you start to figure if they're ultimately trying to weave truths into a lie.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Why's that?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Well, do you know who it is waiting in that room?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Giovanna Rossati.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If there's anyone who could actually get Texas to come back to Siracusa...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It ain't me, or Bernardo. And it sure as hell isn't Signora Sicilia.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It's her, Giovanna.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Cellinia, you're a lot taller than you used to be.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Makes sense, doesn't it? It's been years.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: By the way, I met some of your friends from Lungmen. Your name came up a few times, and from what they said, I can tell they're worried about you.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: ...I didn't think they'd come here.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You're nothing like them, at all. I never thought you'd make such lively, outgoing friends with that personality of yours.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You don't count?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: If you really thought I was your friend, you wouldn't have gone so long without writing me.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Alright. I know you must be hiding something else.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Nothing much.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: The liquidation came too suddenly. None of Columbia's famiglie could sleep at night. I couldn't bear to see that any longer, so I stood up to take charge of the situation.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I opened up talks with Signora Sicilia, and we basically managed to sort things out.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: That's all there is to it.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You make it sound so easy.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Honestly, I should be complaining to you.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: But it's been too long since I've had anyone to confide in.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: So that's why you poured your heart and soul into your scripts.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Haha, could you tell? 'La Morte di Texas' my magnum opus.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: There were some details in it that only you'd know.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I guess that means my memory's pretty good then.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: But, I could never decide on what to do with Act III, with your 'death.'
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I guess there's no need to think about it anymore.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Actually, becoming a playwright had another purpose. It's an open secret that Bernardo passed responsibility for the famiglia to his son, while he went on to become the artistic director of his troupe, Compagnia dell'alba.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I wanted a chance to meet him. You know, there aren't many mafiosi who would do something like that.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: But the one who ended up shattering all expectations, was him.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I guess I should've expected it after all, from the man who built Famiglia Bellone into what it is in just a single generation.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: By the looks of things, he really wants to challenge Signora Sicilia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You don't seem worried about it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: All I can say is, if Bernardo considers you his trump card against the Rossatis, he's counting his fowlbeasts before they've hatched.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You were right to come to me, Cellinia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: No matter what's going on between you and the Bellones, I can help you.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Join me.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: The two of us, together, will make a difference in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: And not just because you're Salvadore's granddaughter.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Because I know you, Cellinia. You can make a difference.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: We'll start over together, Cellinia.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Don't you want to know how I managed to survive?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Giovanna, it was no fluke that I survived the liquidation.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So you're here, standing on this stage, performing this play... How much do you know about what happened seven years ago?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Seven years ago... Texas's father, Giuseppe, murdered his own father, Salvadore, and declared that the Texases would no longer operate under Siracusa's control.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That upset Signora Sicilia, who sent an elite force from the Twelve Families to Columbia to 'liquidate' the Texas Family.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You were part of that, weren't you?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Look who's such a smarty.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: At the time, Cellinia Texas was a star-studded name. She was Columbian, but even the Siracusans had nothing but wonderful things to say about her.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: This whole time... you've been trying to beat Texas?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Beat her?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No, no, no.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Back when the Saluzzos were looking after her, we were pretty competitive.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Sometimes I'd win our little contests, sometimes I'd lose.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I did want to beat her, but that had nothing to do with what happened later.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Then...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You certainly do care deeply for her.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Unfortunately, that has nothing to do with the plot of the story either.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: At least tell me what happened.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I joined in the liquidation.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I was fantasizing about how she would fight me to the death for the sake of her famiglia. It got my heart pounding and my blood racing.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But, nothing could've prepared me for what I saw that day.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You're a hitman too, aren't you, Danbrown?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I am.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Signorina Lavinia, seven years ago, I was part of the team that carried out the liquidation of Famiglia Texas.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I arrived in the city ahead of time, took up a job at a carwash, and secretly observed the Texases' every move.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Then, the team from Siracusa arrived.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: And a group of Columbians found me.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Columbian mafiosi are pretty careless. Real full of themselves.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I could've dealt with them easy enough, if it wasn't for that one girl.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I knew her. She was a Texas, but everyone said she was like a Siracusan.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: ...Cellinia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: When I see you, I'm sometimes reminded of her.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Was she as stupid as me, rambling on about ideals with a murderer?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Signorina Lavinia.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I never meant to make fun of your ideals. It's just... I can barely believe it.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Hearing you talk about that stuff... it's like listening to a real pretty fairy tale.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: To me, your ideals are so pretty, they're a kind of shortcut to get me a good night's sleep.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: That day, I was ready to fight for my life.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I was convinced she would see right through me.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: She let me walk right by her, just like this.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: The audience has scattered in every direction. The battle between murderers has moved on.
The theater has emptied out.
As Lappland speaks, she takes light dance steps out onto the empty stage.
The associates of Famiglia Texas were already pretty much wiped out.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But, what about Cellinia?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: She was the only one missing.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We couldn't let anyone live to talk about what happened, especially not the eldest daughter. So, we all went to track her down.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And that was when chaos broke out.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The Texas mansion went up in flames, burning away the famiglia's very existence.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And the arsonist... was standing there at the front door.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Right in front of me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: She slowly turned and walked towards me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: At that moment, I understood.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: She decided to stand by and watch the end of her own famiglia.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But who could blame her?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Her father murdered her grandfather, and didn't want to be an accomplice to that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Only she had the right to blame herself.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But, there's more to it than that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: When I looked into her eyes, what I saw was—
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Exhaustion.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Cellinia's story... is no secret to Famiglia Saluzzo, or to me.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: After all, the one who led the Saluzzo team at the time was none other than Signorina Lappland.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: She got kicked out because she went out on her own to hunt down Cellinia. Her men got caught up in a counterattack, and a lot of them died.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: I won't run away, nor will I avert my eyes.
For so long, she has told herself as much.
But this time, her words fail her.
Look at the bodies on the street, Lavinia. Listen to the shouts and cries in the distance.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: What can you do?
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: The only advice I can give you is the same I gave to Cellinia.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Run.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: The farther, the better.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Even if your past is going to catch up to you, you'll at least enjoy a moment of peace.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: Otherwise— you will die.
attributes.name: Carwash Worker

attributes.content: But, I...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I still don't want to.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Her past kicked down her door.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It might've been against her will at first, but she was forced out only to find nothing changed—
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Maybe she'll decide the things she ran away from weren't actually all that bad.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Her life in Lungmen... might've been a slightly extended vacation.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And now, the one most intimately connected with her family and her past... is standing right in front of her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's what you wanted to tell me, right?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: If that's the case... I will respect her decision.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Even though you're her best friend?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Because I'm her best friend.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Darn tootin'.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Unless— the pizza in Siracusa becomes inedible.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: My grandfather was a sentimental man. He sent me to Siracusa, hoping I would remember my roots.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I lived there for a while.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: People there told me all the time that I fit in, like a Siracusan.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But for me, I was just doing what I'd always been doing.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The way I lived my life in Columbia was no different than the way I lived in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: And what I saw in Siracusa was no different from what I saw in Columbia.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You might know the story of Famiglia Texas like the back of your hand, but I saw it with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Life isn't a play where every move is sprinkled with a little heroism or villainy. What happened was just an undignified slaughter.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: My father bought a counterfeit gun from Blacksteel. When he pulled the trigger, it exploded and did a number on him.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: My grandfather fell to the ground. My father drew his knife with his injured hand, but the first stab went wide.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I heard everything from the doorway. Hoarse curses, groans of pain...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The commotion lasted for a long time before it finally ended.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: In that moment, I was exhausted. Exhausted with everything.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So I decided to leave.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Are you telling me that Lungmen is your home now?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I don't know. I can't say for sure.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But, I at least know I had a pretty good time there.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You're just like you were back then. Blunt, and straight to the point.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Looks like I'm the one getting ahead of myself.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Here I was thinking you came to ask for my help.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Or at least, you'd want to catch up with me.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: But in the end, you're here to tell me... that we can never go back—
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You know, Cellinia, that's awfully heartless of you.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I was shocked when I heard you were still alive.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: But you went ahead and stamped out my hope, all over again.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Giovanna.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I don't want to be Siracusan, or Columbian.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I just want to be Cellinia Texas.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: This is your last chance.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: If you walk through those doors, you'll be my enemy. The Rossatis' enemy.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: You'll be in our way, and I, as Donna Rossati, have a responsibility to eliminate everything that stands in our way.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Don't make me do this.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: We're just too sentimental, Giovanna.
attributes.name: Texas
